name: Psycho critters
description:
Critter heroes, well more like psycho critters is actually some kind of hybrid, they are not like anything youve seen before
and they can transform and do crazy stuff too!

Play through dozens of action packed mini levels with the critters,
Concur each level and seveal bosses along the way,
Fin the magic loop holes and collect power balls along the way.

Needless to say, just try to avoid the spinning blades, cannonballs and other crazy things you might come across while
playing the action packed worlds in the awesome game of Psycho Critters!
